objects.name: Smooth Operator configuration file
objects.description: File path to the Smooth Operator configuration file .main_storage
objects.pattern: [file:name = '.main_storage' AND file:parent_directory_ref.path LIKE '$HOME/Library/Application Support/3CX Desktop App/']

objects.name: Smooth Operator second-stage payload
objects.description: File path to the Smooth Operator second-stage payload UpdateAgent
objects.pattern: [file:name = 'UpdateAgent' AND file:parent_directory_ref.path LIKE '$HOME/Library/Application Support/3CX Desktop App/']

objects.description: MD5 hash of the malicious 3CX DMG file

objects.name: smooth operator
objects.description: macOS supply chain malware that exfiltrates victim data using a custom data encoding algorithm over HTTPS

objects.name: 3CX
objects.description: Company whose software was compromised in the supply chain attack

objects.name: Apple
objects.description: Notarized the malicious 3CX software package

objects.name: T1195.001
objects.description: Supply Chain Compromise: Compromise Software Dependencies and Development Tools

objects.name: T1554
objects.description: Compromise Client Software Binary

objects.name: T1140
objects.description: Deobfuscate/Decode Files or Information

objects.name: T1070.004
objects.description: Indicator Removal: File Deletion

objects.name: T1497.003
objects.description: Virtualization/Sandbox Evasion: Time Based Evasion

objects.name: T1119
objects.description: Automated Collection

objects.name: T1071.001
objects.description: Application Layer Protocol: Web Protocols

objects.name: T1008
objects.description: Fallback Channels

objects.name: T1020
objects.description: Automated Exfiltration

objects.name: Smooth_Operator_Obfuscation
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule Smooth_Operator_Obfuscation { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "This rule identifies unique strings and code present in the C2 string obfuscation code of Smooth Operator." date = "2023-06-29" hash1 = "769383fc65d1386dd141c960c9970114547da0c2" hash2 = "9e9a5f8d86356796162cee881c843cde9eaedfb3" strings: $ = {48 69 ?? 61 60 60 60 48 89 ?? 48 C1 EA 3F 48 C1 ?? 25 01 ?? 6B ?? 55} $ = "!#$%&()*+-.0123456789:;<>?@ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ[]_abcdefghi" $ = {3E00C7[5-6]26706572} // &per $ = {3E00C7[5-6]26646F6C} // &dol $ = {75733E00C7[5-6]26706C75} // &plus $ = {6D693E00C7[5-6]2673656D} // &semi condition: ((uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACF) or (uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABF)) and all of them }

objects.name: Smooth_Operator_Obfuscation_2
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule Smooth_Operator_Obfuscation_2 { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "This rule identifies unique code sections in the C2 string obfuscation algorithm of Smooth Operator." date = "2023-06-29" hash1 = "769383fc65d1386dd141c960c9970114547da0c2" hash2 = "9e9a5f8d86356796162cee881c843cde9eaedfb3" strings: $a_1 = {4869C8616060604889CA48C1EA3F48C1F92501D16BC95529C8[0-3]83F807} $b_1 = {438D1C24F7DB41F7DC} // neg $b_2 = {478D3C3641F7DF41F7DE} // neg condition: ((uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACF) or (uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABF)) and any of ($b*) and $a_1 }

objects.name: Smooth_Operator_Strings
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule Smooth_Operator_Strings { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "This rule identifies broader functionality across Smooth Operator, identifying strings observed throughout." date = "2023-06-29" hash1 = "769383fc65d1386dd141c960c9970114547da0c2" strings: $ = {80 [2] 7A 48 FF C0 48 83 F8 38} // .main_storage XOR loop $ = "<key>ProductVersion</key>" $ = ".session-lock" $ = "%s/.main_storage" $ = "%s/UpdateAgent" $ = {3715001316161B554F544A5A522D13141E150D095A342E5A4B4A544A415A2D13144C4E41 5A024C4E535A3B0A0A161F2D1F1831130E554F494D54494C5A5231322E3736565A1613111F 5A3D1F191115535A39120815171F554B4A42544A544F494F43544B48425A291B1C1B0813 554F494D54494C} // XOR'd UA $ = {B02D[0-8]88470888470D884712884717C6472400} // victim ID generation condition: ((uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACF) or (uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABF)) and 4 of them }

objects.name: Smooth_Operator_C2_codes
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule Smooth_Operator_C2_codes { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "This rule identifies sections of code which are responsible for parsing tasking command codes in Smooth Operator." date = "2023-06-29" hash1 = "769383fc65d1386dd141c960c9970114547da0c2" strings: $ = {80340F7A48FFC14839C8} // XOR deobfuscate tasking $ = {8B073D4938000074??3D018000008B4C24??0F[3-6]3D01900000} // C2 codes condition: ((uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACF) or (uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABF)) and all of them }

objects.name: Smooth_Operator_Sleeps
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule Smooth_Operator_Sleeps { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "This rule identifies algorithms used by the malware developer to generate random time values in Smooth Operator." date = "2023-06-29" hash1 = "769383fc65d1386dd141c960c9970114547da0c2" strings: $ = {E8[4]E8[4]89C14869C93FC5254348C1E9246BC93D29C86BE83C81C5100E0000B80F0000 00} // between beacon time generation $ = {E8[4]E8[4]89C1490FAFCE48C1E9238D0C898D0C4929C8} // C2 index $ = {89E8D1E841BE932449924C0FAFF049C1EE224489F0C1E0044489F129C14101EE4101CE48 8DBC24[4]4C892FE8} // initial sleep condition: ((uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACF) or (uint32(0) == 0xFEEDFACE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABE) or (uint32(0) == 0xCAFEBABF)) and any of them }

objects.name: Smooth_Operator_II
objects.description: YARA rule to detect related activity.
objects.pattern: rule Smooth_Operator_II { meta: author = "NCSC" description = "This rule identifies strings observed in the second stage of Smooth Operator." date = "2023-06-29" hash1 = "9e9a5f8d86356796162cee881c843cde9eaedfb3" strings: $ = "3cx_auth_id=%s;3cx_auth_token_content=%s;__tutma=true" $ = "AccountName":

objects.name: Analisi Malware: Smooth Operator
objects.description: This report contains technical analysis and indicators associated with malware. smooth operator.
